tags: ever since i learned that fact I think about it a lot

summary: there exists a dark timeline, one darker than this one, where the 3D animated Moomins doesn’t look like thisbut like this...
body:
there exists a dark timeline, one darker than this one, where the 3D animated Moomins doesn’t look like this

but like this

because if Tove Jansson didn’t turn down Walt Disney to buy up the franchise, there would only be two options for Moomin: be the gay winnie the pooh or be the white abomination with 3,000 skin pores/hair follicles

reblog.comment:
there exists a dark timeline, one darker than this one, where the 3D animated Moomins doesn’t look like this

but like this

because if Tove Jansson didn’t turn down Walt Disney to buy up the franchise, there would only be two options for Moomin: be the gay winnie the pooh or be the white abomination with 3,000 skin pores/hair follicles

there exists a dark timeline, one darker than this one, where the 3D animated Moomins doesn’t look like this

but like this

because if Tove Jansson didn’t turn down Walt Disney to buy up the franchise, there would only be two options for Moomin: be the gay winnie the pooh or be the white abomination with 3,000 skin pores/hair follicles

but like this

blog.name: spaceyjoxter
blog.title: Moomins but in space
blog.description: A french space lover and Moomin enthousiast who's rather found of a certain lazy cat-like dad. Will mostly reblog, but might also share some random thoughts and headcanons using the "#Spacey thoughts" tag. Don't be afraid to send me an ask if you want!

summary: My thoughts on the Moominvalley animation sample thingy
title: My thoughts on the Moominvalley animation sample thingy
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Jk_HhtzuyfY

I just found out about this video. How come no one told me about it before??

The english voices are pretty good! I’m also glad they kept the designs similar to the ones from the 90′s anime. The animation is fine. The way the arms and legs are modeled is still a bit strange to me though. I also find it hard to see the expressions on Moomin and his parent’s faces, but I mean, it was always hard for me to read the expressions on people’s faces, so maybe that’s just me!

It was also great to see familliar scenes remade in 3D! As for the song at the begining, I like the melody, but am not a fan of the voice ( no offense to the singer!! ). I just think it sounds too “pop-ish” for the Moomins? What do you guys think?

But yeah. Overall, I’m pretty happy about this little teaser we got! Eager to see more of the show!

summary:
Realized that I maybe have to watch 
Moominvalley

first in Finnish, tho. YLE will show it with dubs (Olavi Uusivirta is...
body:
Realized that I maybe have to watch Moominvalley first in Finnish, tho. YLE will show it with dubs (Olavi Uusivirta is Snufkin’s voice actor, so I’m pretty excited about that).

Have to wait for DVD to watch it in English. And here I was waiting to hear Taron Egerton as Moomintroll in February.

reblog.comment:
Realized that I maybe have to watch Moominvalley first in Finnish, tho. YLE will show it with dubs (Olavi Uusivirta is Snufkin’s voice actor, so I’m pretty excited about that).

Have to wait for DVD to watch it in English. And here I was waiting to hear Taron Egerton as Moomintroll in February.

Have to wait for DVD to watch it in English. And here I was waiting to hear Taron Egerton as Moomintroll in February.
trail.content:

Have to wait for DVD to watch it in English. And here I was waiting to hear Taron Egerton as Moomintroll in February.

summary: First look at the animated characters of Moominvalley TV series revealed
title: First look at the animated characters of Moominvalley TV series revealed
excerpt: The first look at the heart-warming and lively Moomin characters of the highly anticipated new Moomin animation series Moominvalley has been revealed today.
description: Guys! If you’re interested in the new Moominvalley series, PLEASE CHECK THIS OUT! They are making so much progress that I am more than beyond excited for the new series. OMG! It looks amazing. There isn’t an English trailer yet, but that right now doesn’t matter to me because I am too hyped to even think when a trailer could be released. The show will apparently be aired in Spring 2019. Not too long now.
